Package br.com.concepting.framework.resources

Class BaseResourcesLoader<O>

  • java.lang.Object
    • br.com.concepting.framework.resources.BaseResourcesLoader<O>
  • Type Parameters:
    O - Class that defines the resources.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PropertiesResourcesLoader, XmlResourcesLoader
    public abstract class BaseResourcesLoader<O>
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that defines the basic implementation to manipulate resources.
    Since:

      • BaseResourcesLoader

        protected BaseResourcesLoader​(java.lang.String resourcesId)
                       throws InvalidResourcesException
        Constructor - Manipulates specific resources.
        Parameters:
        resourcesId - String that contains the identifier of the resources.
        Throws:
        InvalidResourcesException - Occurs when the resources could not be read.
